name: Dog's Memories
description:
Help the Dog reunited with it's family. 
Gather all Memories & his collars to unlock Secret End.
Disclaimer:
The traps has been setup by Cats.

-- 

Controls:

Move Up
UP / W
Move DownDOWN / S
Move RightRIGHT / D
Move LeftLEFT / AInteract (Pull & Push)
SPACEBAR
